channel.description: Recent content in blog on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Migrating to Hugo
item.description: If you’ve frequented this site in the past you should hopefully have noticed a huge change to the way the site looks and hopefully the speed at which the site serves content. Over the past 2 weeks I’ve been working with a static site tool, similar to that of Jekyll, called Hugo. Reasons for the Migration Ease The first and biggest reason I’m moving to a github based site is due to the ease with which I can make changes.
